id: The Samsung Chromebook Plus Launch at WIRED25
paragraph:
Subscribe to 'WIRED'
                  on YouTube to keep up with all of
                  our latest videos and shows.
                Produced By WIRED Brand Lab For Samsung Chromebook Plus | In September of 2018, WIRED celebrated our quarter century anniversary with a four day festival in San Francisco. As part of the celebration, we partnered with Samsung and the new Chromebook Plus to explore the new world of the modern, always-on consumer.© 2018 Condé Nast. All rights reserved.
